document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ec88ff">Arrows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#54f4ff">slay </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#54f4ff">strike, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecb894">slew </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8bcff">appareled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8bcff">Escape, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ec88ff">trackless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#54f4ff">Tomb </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
